title: Love Story ‘Manon’ Kicks Off UH Moores Opera Center’s Performance Season (University of Houston)
text: ( Source : University of Houston ) Manon is a simple woman whose journey to the convent takes a romantic detour. She falls in love with the chivalrous Chevalier des Grieux but is seduced by another man's promise of wealth and security. Her
